docs.lead_paragraph: The random slaying of an Australia native who came to the U.S. to play baseball and earn a college degree has touched hearts in the U.S. and beyond, as tens of thousands of dollars streamed into a fund designed to help Chris Lane's parents bring their son back home.

headline.main: Fund for Slain Australian Player Tops $100K
headline.print_headline: Fund for Slain Australian Player Tops $100K

docs.snippet: What to do with a 39-year-old who won’t leave home? Let him turn it into his own Roden Crater....
docs.lead_paragraph: What to do with a 39-year-old who won’t leave home? Let him turn it into his own Roden Crater.
docs.abstract: Artist Kenny Irwin Jr turns two-acre property in Palm Springs, Calif, given to him by his father into showcase for giant science-fiction-inspired sculptures he creates with found materials and tons of glue; Irwin, who is 39 and still lives at home, has been transforming family residence with art since he was 12.
